abstract: The European Central Bank and the Bank of England left their benchmark interest rates unchanged.
snippet: The European Central Bank and the Bank of England left their benchmark interest rates unchanged.
lead_paragraph: The European Central Bank on Thursday left its benchmark interest rate unchanged, and its president, Jean-Claude Trichet, expressed cautious optimism that Europe’s sovereign debt crisis was easing and that the euro area economy was growing faster than expected.

headline.main: With Recovery Continuing, European Banks Leave Rates Alone
headline.print_headline: With Recovery Continuing, European Banks Leave Rates Alone

byline.original: By Jack Ewing and Julia Werdigier

headline.main: Recovery Sees European Banks Leave Rates Alone

abstract: Ford Motor has expanded its board to 14 members by adding Sprint Nextel Chairman James Hance Jr. as a director, The Associated Press reported.
snippet: Ford Motor has expanded its board to 14 members by adding Sprint Nextel Chairman James Hance Jr. as a director, The Associated Press reported.
lead_paragraph: Ford Motor has expanded its board to 14 members by adding Sprint Nextel Chairman James Hance Jr. as a director, The Associated Press reported.

headline.main: Ford Adds Sprint Nextel’s Hance to Board

abstract: The global private banking sector has the potential to nearly double its size thanks to about $10 trillion of untapped wealth that is still up for grabs, Reuters reported, citing the Scorpio Partnership’s annual benchmark.

headline.main: For Wealth Managers, $10 Trillion Up For Grabs

abstract: For the second month in a row, John A. Paulson suffered acute losses at his flagship funds, The Financial Times reported.

headline.main: Paulson Funds Said Hit by Steep Losses in June

abstract: Bank of America is seeking to capitalize on its sponsorship deal with Major League Baseball by introducing a commercial with a baseball theme during the Fox coverage of the All-Star Game.
snippet: Bank of America is seeking to capitalize on its sponsorship deal with Major League Baseball by introducing a commercial with a baseball theme during the Fox coverage of the All-Star Game.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America is seeking to capitalize on its sponsorship deal with Major League Baseball by introducing a commercial with a baseball theme during the Fox coverage of the All-Star Game on Tuesday.

headline.main: Bank of America Will Keep All-Star Game Viewers in Stitches
